name: we're sorry
description:
A deplorable game that will take less than 5 minutes to suffer through.

The first game in the IDK Project series.

Synopsis:

4 fellas meet up and satanic chaos occurs.

WARNINGS:

Contains death jokes, references to memes, talk of blood and murder, and the summoning of Lucifer.

MUSIC CREDIT:

"Pixel Peeker Polka - faster" by Kevin Macleod
